contents: 1. fol. 1a-9a: [Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Risālah fī ādāb al-baḥth].
2. fol. 10b-30b: Hādhā kitāb Masʻūd al-Rūmī ʻalá risālat Shams al-Dīn fī al-ādāb.
6. fol. 87b-114a: Ḥāshiyat al-ʻAjam ʻalá ʻImād al-Dīn.
extent: 116 leaves : paper ; 205 x 145 mm. bound to 213 x 151 mm.
